mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.courseId AS "courseId", a.learn_date AS "learnDate", a.learn_begin_date AS "learnBeginDate", a.learn_end_date AS "learnEndDate", a.coathId AS "coathId", a.rollCall_status_flag AS "rollCallStatusFlag", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", coach.nameCn AS "coathName"
LEFT JOIN sys_base_coach coach on coach.id = a.coathId and coach.del_flag = '0'
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ser_course_details( id, courseId, learn_date, learn_begin_date, learn_end_date, coathId, rollCall_status_flag, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{courseId}, #{learnDate}, #{learnBeginDate}, #{learnEndDate}, #{coathId}, #{rollCallStatusFlag}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ser_course_details SET courseId = #{courseId}, learn_date = #{learnDate}, learn_begin_date = #{learnBeginDate}, learn_end_date = #{learnEndDate}, coathId = #{coathId}, rollCall_status_flag = #{rollCallStatusFlag}, update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, beginDate = #{beginDate} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select:
select
FROM ser_course_details a
where a.courseId = #{courseId} ORDER BY a.learn_date asc
